## ğŸ“‹ Pull Request (PR)

### ğŸŒ³ Branch Information

**Source Branch** : `[relevant-tag]/[dev-username]/[user-story-id]`  
**Target Branch** : `main`  
**User Story / Ticket ID** : `#___`

**Relevant Tags** :

- **`feature/`** : Indication of New Feature or Functionality or a Significant Enhancement into the System

- **`fix/`** : Signifies Bug or Error Fixes in the System

- **`documentation/`** : Changes to the Documentation File(s)

- **`style/`** : Addition / Changes to Design Styles of the Application UI / UX

- **`refactor/`** : Code Refactoring (Variable Renaming / Code Restructuring or Formatting) that doesn't affect Functionality

- **`data/`** : Used for Database, Information & Data Manipulation

- **`test/`** : Adding, Fixing or Modifying Tests; No Production Code Change

- **`chore/`** : Updating Build Scripts / Upgrading Dependencies, Maintenance & Changes in Tools; No Production Code Change

- **`cicd/`** : Addition / Changes to CI / CD Configuration / Scripts

- **`performance/`** : Performance Improvements / Optimization Changes

- **`devEx/`** : Developers' Experience : Use for Improvement of Developers' Experience

- **`revert/`** : Undoing the Changes made by a Previous Commit

- **`miscellaneous/`** : Use for anything that does not clearly fall into any of the previous categories

**Example** : `feature/jzhk/user-authentication-123`

---

### âœ… Checklist

#### Code Quality

- [ ] My Code Follows the Project's Style Guidelines
- [ ] I have Performed a Self-Review of My Code
- [ ] I have Commented My Code, Particularly in Hard-To-Understand Areas
- [ ] My Changes Generate No New Warnings / Errors
- [ ] I have Removed Any `console.log`s / Debug Code

#### Testing

- [ ] I have Added Tests that Prove My Fix is Effective / That My Feature Works
- [ ] New & Existing Unit Tests Pass Locally with My Changes
- [ ] I have Tested My Changes in Multiple Browsers (If Frontend)
- [ ] I have Tested My Changes on Mobile Devices (If Applicable)

#### Documentation

- [ ] I have Updated the Documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have Updated the `CHANGELOG.md`
- [ ] I have Added / Updated `JSDoc` / `docstrings` for New Functions
- [ ] I have Updated Type Definitions (If TypeScript)

#### Database & Migrations

- [ ] I have Created Necessary Database Migrations (If Applicable)
- [ ] Migrations are Reversible (Have Both Up & Down Methods)
- [ ] I have Tested Migrations on a Clean Database

#### Security

- [ ] I have Checked for Security Vulnerabilities
- [ ] No Sensitive Data (API Keys, Passwords) is Exposed
- [ ] User Inputs are Properly Validated & Sanitized
- [ ] Authentication / Authorization is Properly Implemented

#### Performance

- [ ] I have Considered Performance Implications
- [ ] No Unnecessary Database Queries / API Calls
- [ ] Images / Assets are Optimized (If Applicable)
- [ ] No Memory Leaks Introduced

### ğŸ‘€ Reviewer Guidelines

**For Reviewers** :

- [ ] Tests are Comprehensive & Pass
- [ ] Documentation is Clear & Complete
- [ ] No Security Vulnerabilities Introduced
- [ ] Performance Implications are Acceptable
- [ ] Breaking Changes are Clearly Documented
